data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Seoul.
In the minute 3, Ji Um Cho signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Seoul's half.
Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 9, Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Kim Bo-seob gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 11, Goal! Sangju Sangmu have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Park Yong-woo.
That's a fine assist from Kang Sang-uh.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
In the minute 12, Sangju Sangmu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ji Um Cho awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 18, Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sangju Sangmu needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 21, Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu push upfield but Ji Um Cho quickly pulls them for offside.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
In the minute 24, Kim Won-sik equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Han Seung-gyu with an assist there.
In the minute 28, Lee Chan-dong is back on the pitch.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lee Chan-dong.
At World Cup Stadium, Seoul are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 30, Can Seoul capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in Seoul.
Sangju Sangmu's Oh Se-Hun gets in a shot on goal at World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Seoul's Yun Ju-tae breaks free at World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
In the minute 36, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Seoul Sangju Sangmu drive forward through Han Seok-jong. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sangju Sangmu's Lee Chan-dong has been booked in Seoul.
In the minute 37, Jung Han-min is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Lee Chan-dong is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Seoul's Jung Han-min looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Sangju Sangmu's Lee Chan-dong is back in action after a slight knock.
Sangju Sangmu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seoul.
In the minute 41, Seoul are pushing forward but Yoon Jong-gyu's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Ji Um Cho will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Seoul's Yun Ju-tae misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Seon-min Moon is replacing Lee Chan-dong for Sangju Sangmu at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 46, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Han Seung-gyu.
Great play from Jung Hyun-cheol to set up the goal.
Ji Um Cho signals a throw-in for Seoul, close to Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Can Seoul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Ji Um Cho awards the away team a throw-in.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
Sangju Sangmu pushes forward through Kim Bo-seob, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 55, Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Seoul territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kim Tae-wan is making the team's second substitution at World Cup Stadium with Moon Chang-jin replacing Oh Se-Hun.
In the minute 57, Yun Ju-tae (Seoul) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 60, Seoul are coming forward and Yun Ju-tae gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ji Um Cho awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Sangju Sangmu's Seon-min Moon is on target but unsuccessful.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 66, Kim Ho-young (Seoul) is making a first substitution, with Kang Sang-heui replacing Jung Han-min.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Seoul.
The home team have replaced Kim Jin-ya with Yang Yu-min. This is the second substitution made today by Kim Ho-young.
In the minute 72, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Ji Um Cho signals a Sangju Sangmu throw-in in Seoul's half.
In Seoul, Moon Chang-jin of Sangju Sangmu is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Lee Sang-ki (Sangju Sangmu) gets a yellow card.
Sangju Sangmu are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 79, Kim Bo-seob gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Seoul!
In the minute 81, Song Seung-min is replacing Kang Sang-uh for Sangju Sangmu at World Cup Stadium.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Seoul.
Free kick for Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 86, Yun Ju-tae for Seoul drives towards goal at World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Seoul territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Sangju Sangmu in Seoul.
In the minute 88, Can Sangju Sangmu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Sangju Sangmu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Seoul make their third substitution with Cha Oh-yeon replacing Jung Hyun-cheol.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu close to the penalty box.
Free kick Sangju Sangmu.
At World Cup Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Seoul's Han Seung-gyu is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
Ji Um Cho signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Ji Um Cho.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
